info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.eva.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.eva.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Allow: HEAD,GET,POST,OPTIONS
Content-Type: text/html
Date: Sun, 14 Aug 2022 15:22:00 GMT
Server: Apache
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Via: 1.1 alproxy
Content-Length: 0

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.eva.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: app.eva.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://app.eva.beta.gouv.fr/'
